description:
- - -
This package has been deprecated in favor of __[arduino](https://chocolatey.org/packages/arduino)__ package because of Chocolatey naming conventions.  

It is recommended that you uninstall this package before installing the new package: `cuninst arduinoide && cinst arduino`

If you have both packages installed, you may safely remove the arduinoide chocolatey package by deleting the following directories: `%ChocolateyInstall%\lib\arduinoide.*`
- - -
summary: Open-source electronics prototyping platform based on flexible, easy-to-use hardware and software
author: Arduino team
